results.question: In "Portal 2", Cave Johnson started out Aperture Science as a shower curtain company.
The PlayStation was originally a joint project between Sega and Sony that was a Sega Genesis with a disc drive.
In the game "Subnautica", a "Spadefish" will attack you.
The names of Roxas's Keyblades in Kingdom Hearts are "Oathkeeper" and "Oblivion".
In Pokémon, Bulbasaur is the only starter pokemon that is a Grass/Poison type.
The Konami Code is known as Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Right, Right, Left, B, A, Start.
In Portal, the Companion Cube's ARE sentient.
In "Starbound", the track played by the Decorated Music Box is named "Atlas".
The game "Pocket Morty" has a Morty called "Pocket Mortys Morty"?
The game "Jetpack Joyride" was created by "Redbrick Studios".
